title: GEGeek_Toolkit82.7z
description:
1. After downloading the .7z file, you first need to unzip the file to the root of {X}: drive.
2. Manually launch "GeGeek Toolkit.exe" from within the GEGeek Toolkit dir on {X}: drive.
3. Right click the new gray circle icon in taskbar.
4. Hover over the "GeGeek ver.x.x" menu item near bottom and run "Run Ketarin Update".
5. Now from within the Ketarin program click  "Update All". Go get coffee.
6. When finished - Close Ketarin and GEGeek Toolkit. Then relaunch Toolkit and test.
7. Copy whole GEGeek Toolkit directory to root of Flash Drive.
8. Run "Run Ketarin Update" once per week, as some programs will always download
